EmailTemplate.subject: Challenge Volunteering day in Brent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
YOU’RE INVITED TO A CHALLENGE VOLUNTEERING DAY AT WOODFIELD AVENUE ALLOTMENTS
On 13th April between 10-4pm The Challenge Network are inviting all Brent graduates and their friends to come together to get involved with transforming Woodfield Avenue Allotments.
This will be a fun day for you to meet up with mates from the summer, meet new friends, play an active role in the visual change of your area and find out about more things you can get involved in during the summer.
Activities on the day will include: vegetation clearance, bramble & wood cutting, clearing and tree maintenance.
The address is: Woodfield Avenue Allotments, Woodfield Avenue, North Wembley, HA0 3TP
Why is this a good opportunity?
Not only is this a chance to meet up with new people, it is a chance to be part of Brent’s regeneration project. It shows that you are passionate about your community and you are dedicated/hard-working.
Bring a bottle of water and suitable clothing. Come on down and let’s celebrate spring together. Lunch will be provided.
Do not forget to RSVP to keisha.davidson@the-challenge.org if you are coming- email your full name and phone number. Alternatively, you can call/text Keisha on 07584 232 766.
See you on 13th April.
